alibaba/EasyCV

PyTorch computer vision toolkit with self-supervised learning, transformers, and detection models

View on index

Related repos

  • PyTorch models for high-res vision tasks using self-supervised learning
  • Video and image annotation tool for computer vision projects
  • Notebooks for computer vision tasks like detection, segmentation, and OCR using popular models
  • toolkit for computer vision tasks like detection, tracking, and dataset handling
  • differentiable computer vision tools for PyTorch
  • PyTorch tool for 3D human animation, reconstruction, and motion processing
  • Python and OpenCV-based video scene cut detection
  • Shows how to use OpenCV and COLMAP for simple structure from motion and 3D scene reconstruction
  • Curated list of computer vision papers and code
